casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joshua BALLARD. No. 1AP07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 3, 2007. Staples Hughes, Appellate Defender, for Ballard. Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ____ N.C.App. ____, 638 S.E.2d 474.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of January 2007 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of January 2007."
